actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

official_title: To provide grants to local educational agencies to establish or expand prekindergarten programs for children who are not yet enrolled in kindergarten.

summary.text: Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to establish Prekindergarten Programs as a new part L of title X (Programs of National Significance).Authorizes the Secretary of Education to provide grants to applicant local educational agencies to establish or expand prekindergarten early learning programs, which meet specified requirements, for three-, four-, and five-year old children.Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To provide grants to local educational agencies to establish or expand prekindergarten programs for children who are not yet enrolled in kindergarten.
